The University of Washington Student Newspaper Tuesday March  

News

An 18yearold with seniority Student Life  A UW student balances the rigors of university life with the uncertainty of graduating while still in her teens PERIOD Amanda Gauthier Daily Staff

After one year of high school Marsha Eng decided it Though this may not be a rare occurrence Eng actually had another option the Early Entrance Program at the UW.Early Entrance students spend a rigorous year in Transition School catching up to the college level in a variety of subjects before entering the UW honors program PERIOD said Eng who is now a computer engineering senior at age .Eng added to her already mounting pressures by taking calculus instead of the regular mathematics offering PERIOD she laughed.Though Eng pushes herself to get good grades she does more than just study including volunteering regularly at the Pacific Science Center and working for oncampus Computing and Communications labs.Socially Eng has found a niche with the other brainy teens who hang out at the edge of campus in Guthrie Annex II PERIOD Eng said.Halfway into her first year at the UW she and several other Early Entrance students decided to start a drama society called EDS PERIOD Their first production was The Lion the Witch and the Wardrobe in which Eng played Mr PERIOD Beaver PERIOD Eng said PERIOD They have had one major production per year since the clubs founding all performed at the Ethnic Cultural Theater.Eng was assistant director of Agatha Christies Witness for the Prosecution and is now treasurer for the group which is working on a production of The Crucible for early April.Eng also maintains the EDS Website at httpweber.u.washington.edumarshengeds..Like many of her EEP friends Eng still lives at home with her parents and younger sister who attends Roosevelt High School.In fact she has lived in the same house her entire life and is not all that anxious to move PERIOD she laughed.Because she has another year before graduating Eng hasnt decided what to do after that PERIOD she said.Though shes considering graduate school she finds herself still torn between childhood dreams of being Theres just too much out there that I want to do Eng said PERIOD
